scripts.pub:patch: npm run lint && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.pub:minor: npm run lint && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.pub:major: npm run lint && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.pub:local: npm run lint && npm run prepublishOnly && && mv *.tgz ./packs/
scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:local: npm run lint && npm pack && mv *.tgz ./packs/
scripts.docker-build: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 NODE_ENV=production nuxt build && npm --prefix playground run build
scripts.deploy:dev: gcloud auth application-default login && gcloud config configurations activate honoo-development && gcloud auth application-default set-quota-project honoo-development && npm run docker-build && docker build -t asia-northeast1-docker.pkg.dev/honoo-development/ui/development:latest . --platform linux/amd64 && docker push asia-northeast1-docker.pkg.dev/honoo-development/ui/development:latest && gcloud run deploy --image asia-northeast1-docker.pkg.dev/honoo-development/ui/development:latest --project=honoo-development
scripts.deploy:prd: gcloud auth application-default login && gcloud config configurations activate honoo-development && gcloud auth application-default set-quota-project honoo-development && npm run docker-build && docker build -t asia-northeast1-docker.pkg.dev/honoo-development/ui/production:latest . --platform linux/amd64 && docker push asia-northeast1-docker.pkg.dev/honoo-development/ui/production:latest && gcloud run deploy --image asia-northeast1-docker.pkg.dev/honoo-development/ui/production:latest --project=honoo-development
